rows.label: tev001793_MSG0001
rows.name:
Good morning, [ST:playername ].
To think I'd run into you here, of all places![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0002
rows.name: I've actually just completed a mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_JNK0010
rows.name: Support[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_SEL0011
rows.name: Kindly ask Hope if the mission went well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_SEL0021
rows.name: Bluntly ask Hope how much she earned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0009
rows.name:
Oh, it was fine, thank you.
It wasn't a very challenging task at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0010
rows.name:
I performed guard duty for someone doing early-
morning maintenance on the outer wall.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0011
rows.name:
Fortunately, we didn't encounter any indigens,
and the work was completed without incident.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0012
rows.name:
I just stood there like a scarecrow the entire time,
so I didn't even accept the reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0014
rows.name: I didn't accept any compensation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0015
rows.name:
I performed guard duty for someone performing early-
morning maintenance on the outer wall.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0016
rows.name:
But we didn't encounter any indigens, so I merely stood
there like a scarecrow the entire time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0018
rows.name:
Once I've earned enough money to cover the next
month's expenses, I decline additional rewards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0019
rows.name:
Previously, I would only save an amount equal to a
week's expenses, but Ornella convinced me to save
more in case of emergencies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0020
rows.name: I pursue missions to help othersâ€”not for material gain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0021
rows.name:
And for that reason, I prefer to refuse rewards
whenever possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_JNK0030
rows.name: Praise[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_SEL0031
rows.name: Laud Hope's selflessness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_JNK0040
rows.name: Convince[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_SEL0041
rows.name:
Persuade Hope to accept the rewards
and save up a little bit of money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_JNK0050
rows.name: Lecture[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_SEL0051
rows.name:
Tell Hope to honor the terms of her
BLADE contract and take the money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0029
rows.name:
Thank you for saying so. Honestly, I haven't met many
people who approve of my stance on this matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0030
rows.name:
While it hasn't caused me to waiver in my beliefs,
it's always encouraging to have someone's support.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0031
rows.name:
As a gardener, I've always been fond of this quote:
"Money is like manure. It does no good unless you
spread it around."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0032
rows.name:
And extra money just stinks! ...That's not actually part
of the quote, but I think the spirit is there, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0033
rows.name:
Money can do wonderful things to help people,
but only if you let it find its way to those who need it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0034
rows.name:
I'd encourage you to try doing a mission without
accepting the reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0035
rows.name:
Needless to say, I'd be honored to be on your team
when that happens![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0040
rows.name: Ornella said much the same thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0041
rows.name:
I agree that it's a good idea to save some money
for emergencies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0042
rows.name:
After all, money can solve a lot of problems.
It is, as they say, a grand servant and terrible master.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0043
rows.name:
As a gardener, I've always been fond of this quote:
"Money is like manure. It does no good unless you
spread it around."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0044
rows.name:
And extra money just stinks! ...That's not actually part
of the quote, but I think the spirit is there, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0045
rows.name:
Do you know where the reward money for BLADE
missions comes from? In many cases, it's from the
pocket of someone who needs help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0046
rows.name:
Once they spend all their money to pay the first
reward, what will become of them next time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0047
rows.name:
What if they can't afford to pay a reward the next
time they're in trouble?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0048
rows.name:
That's one of the reasons I refuse rewards. So that the
people I've helped will be able to afford help again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0049
rows.name:
But forgive me for blathering on like this.
I do not mean to preach.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0050
rows.name:
I'm going back to the residential district.
I promised Ada I'd meet her there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0054
rows.name:
Ah. So you're concerned that if we BLADEs do not
accept rewards for our work, our clients will expect
such assistance for free?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0055
rows.name: Is that the gist of your problem?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0056
rows.name:
Interesting. I've never heard of anyone being reluctant
to pay a reward for a BLADE mission. Have you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0057
rows.name: I believe that everyone in New LA is a good person.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0058
rows.name: They understand how hard it is to work as a BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0059
rows.name:
And that's why they offer to pay reasonable
compensation for the work that we do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0060
rows.name:
But I don't mean to dismiss your concerns.
They're not entirely baseless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0061
rows.name:
It is certainly not my intention to devalue the work that
other BLADE members do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0062
rows.name:
If I ever felt that the people of New LA were at risk of
somehow losing respect for the BLADEs they employ,
I would have to draw the line.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001793_MSG0063
rows.name:
But I prefer to believe that we live in a just world where
that sort of thing wouldn't happen.[ST:wait ]
